Html:
Hi,

(Please forgive I'm not a pro :)

If I create a marker image in photoshop as png-8, then the marker is correct size in the overlay, but the alpha channel is missing (can't make soft edges). But if I save it as png-24, I get alpha channel, but the image in the overlay is twice the size making it blurred.

Any idea where it goes wrong?

Thanks all!

:)

Mojo
